TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.MethodResponse> MethodCallback(MethodRequest methodRequest, object userContext);
.class public auto ansi sealed MethodCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function MethodCallback(methodRequest As MethodRequest, userContext As Object) As Task(Of MethodResponse)
type MethodCallback = delegate of MethodRequest * obj -> Task<MethodResponse>

Docs.param: Context object passed in when the callback was registered.
Docs.summary: Delegate for method call. This will be called every time we receive a method call that was registered.
